optional_product_spec.description: Obtaining a sustainability certification like EcoCert can enhance the product's appeal to environmentally conscious consumers. This certification assures customers that the product is made from sustainable ingredients and follows eco-friendly practices, which is increasingly important in today's market.

Offering additional fragrance options alongside the Vanilla scent can cater to a broader audience and meet diverse consumer preferences. This flexibility can attract customers who may not prefer vanilla, thus increasing market reach.

Incorporating moisturizing ingredients like Aloe Vera or Vitamin E into the gel formula can enhance the product's appeal by providing skin benefits. This added value can differentiate the product from competitors and attract consumers looking for multifunctional beauty products.

Designing the tube to be compact and leak-proof can enhance its usability for travel. Consumers often seek portable options for their beauty products, and this feature can make the product more appealing for on-the-go use.

Introducing a refillable tube design can promote sustainability and reduce waste. This option can attract eco-conscious consumers and create a loyal customer base that values environmentally friendly practices.

sourcing_description: Item: Gel Perfume Alcohol-free fragrance in a gel format, similar to Korean solid perfumes. - Material: Alcohol-free gel base, cosmetic-grade fragrance oils (optional: similar to LONGTAKE/Addict formulas) - Size: 30gr tube - No. of Selections: 1 - Packaging: Branded tube with custom printing - Certification: Preference for supplier with BPOM cert/license - Quantity Desired: 1,000 pcs - Target Price: Max production cost ~USD 2.96/pc - Customization: YES - Customization needs: Branded tube with printing; scent formulation based on Vanilla profile - Reference Link: https://www.amazon.com/LONGTAKE-Solid-Perfume-Alcohol-Free-Cashmere-like/dp/B0D1QHQSZ6?th=1 - Additional Context: LONGTAKE Solid Perfume in Sandalwood Scent: A long-lasting, alcohol-free, vegan gel fragrance with a cashmere-like finish, suitable for travel. --- Item: Gel Perfume Alcohol-free fragrance in a gel format, similar to Korean solid perfumes. - Material: Alcohol-free gel base, cosmetic-grade fragrance oils (optional: similar to LONGTAKE/Addict formulas) - Size: 30gr tube - No. of Selections: 3 - Packaging: Branded tube with custom printing - Certification: Preference for supplier with BPOM cert/license - Quantity Desired: 1,000 pcs - Target Price: Max production cost ~USD 2.96/pc - Customization: YES - Customization needs: Branded tube with printing; scent formulation based on Woody profiles - Reference Link: https://a-ddictbeauty.com/products/naked-sandalwood-201 - Additional Context: Naked Sandalwood 201: A non-toxic, alcohol-free solid perfume with earthy, rich sandalwood and herbal freshness, designed for layering to create a unique, long-lasting scent.
